always @(*) begin
  idata_d_nx = idata_d;
  if (ivalid) begin
    idata_d_nx = {{(SH_W-I_W)*UNIT_W{1'b0}},idata};
    if (STEP>0) begin
      for (i = STEP; i < O_W; i=i+STEP) begin
        if (in_use[i-1]) begin
          idata_d_nx = (idata << UNIT_W*i) | idata_d;
        end
      end
    end
  end
end

always @(posedge clk) begin
  if (ovalid_s) begin
    idata_d <= idata_d_nx >> O_W*UNIT_W;
  end
